exam.question: They are _______ investors who always make thorough investigations both on local and international markets before making an investment.

answer.explain: 句意： 他们投资很谨慎， 常常在对国内外市场进行了透彻的调研后才做投资决策。 implicit： 暗示的， 含蓄的； conscious： 有意识的， 故意的； indecisive： 非决定性的。

sentences.sContent: a cautious approach to the crisis
The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.sCn: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

sentences.sContent: ...people should be cautious of the excessive use of computers for the following reasons...
...Perhaps this group would be able to express clearly some benefits of the new technology that the more cautious doctors weren't ready to address...
...be cautious with cash flow and extremely attentive to what customers want...

remMethod.val: caut(看作cat) ＋ ious(…的) → 像猫一样的 → 十分小心的， 谨慎的

trans.tranCn: 十分小心的， 谨慎的
trans.tranOther: careful to avoid danger or risks
